h.rus: Что же такое?! Вы получили ошибку!
h.eng: Oh snap! You got an error!

p.rus: Добавьте возможность закрывать все уведомления с данным плагином.
p.eng: Add dismiss functionality to all alert messages with this plugin.

p.rus: When using a .close button, it must be the first child of the .alert-dismissible and no text content may come before it in the markup.
p.eng: When using a .close button, it must be the first child of the .alert-dismissible and no text content may come before it in the markup.

p.rus: Попробуйте немного изменить и подтвердите снова. Duis mollis, est non commodo luctus, nisi erat porttitor ligula, eget lacinia odio sem nec elit. Cras mattis consectetur purus sit amet fermentum.
p.eng: Change this and that and try again. Duis mollis, est non commodo luctus, nisi erat porttitor ligula, eget lacinia odio sem nec elit. Cras mattis consectetur purus sit amet fermentum.

p.rus:
<button type="button" class="btn btn-danger">Выполнить это действие</button>
 <button type="button" class="btn btn-default">Или сделайте это</button>
p.eng:
<button type="button" class="btn btn-danger">Take this action</button>
        <button type="button" class="btn btn-default">Or do this</button>

p.rus: Просто добавьте data-dismiss="alert", чтобы ваша кнопка закрытия автоматически получала функциональность для закрытия. Закрытие предупреждение, удаление из DOM.
p.eng: Just add data-dismiss="alert" to your close button to automatically give an alert close functionality. Closing an alert removes it from the DOM.

p.rus: To have your alerts use animation when closing, make sure they have the .fade and .in classes already applied to them.
p.eng: To have your alerts use animation when closing, make sure they have the .fade and .in classes already applied to them.

p.rus: Makes an alert listen for click events on descendant elements which have the data-dismiss="alert" attribute. (Not necessary when using the data-api's auto-initialization.)
p.eng: Makes an alert listen for click events on descendant elements which have the data-dismiss="alert" attribute. (Not necessary when using the data-api's auto-initialization.)

p.rus: Closes an alert by removing it from the DOM. If the .fade and .in classes are present on the element, the alert will fade out before it is removed.
p.eng: Closes an alert by removing it from the DOM. If the .fade and .in classes are present on the element, the alert will fade out before it is removed.

p.rus: Bootstrap плагин уведомлений предлагает несколько событий для предоставления уведомляющей функциональности.
p.eng: Bootstrap's alert plugin exposes a few events for hooking into alert functionality.

td.rus: Это событие срабатывает во время вызова метода close.
td.eng: This event fires immediately when the close instance method is called.

td.rus: Это событие срабатывает, когда уведомление будет закрыто (при этом ожидается завершение навигации CSS).
td.eng: This event is fired when the alert has been closed (will wait for CSS transitions to complete).
